pros: The team is very friendly and working together is harmonious. The working time is also flexible.
cons: The communication between the team to supervise the intern is sometimes vague.

review_title: Professional, friendly team with great leadership
pros: I worked 4 months with them as a humanitarian intern. My supervisor and the team were extremely nice and supportive. My tasks were well-planned and carefully followed. I felt comfortable to ask any questions that I want to ask, and get support from all team members. I have learned a lot from them. It was a great experience. I highly recommand it.
